Permsy

School Forms, Re-Invented with .NET

Please note Permsy is currently under development.

Now I am no parent, however I have experianced the wrath of mine when I was in elementary and forgot to bring permission slips for fieldtrips, class experiments etc, home for my parents to sign. Permsy is the solution to lost permission forms that every parent and student has been searching for. Permsy keeps track of permission forms and lets parents sign them without needing a physical copy that their child has to bring home from their school. This eliminates the frustration of lost permission forms and reduces paperwork for both parents and teachers.

My role at Permsy is assiting the lead senior developer with frontend development.

For the geeks out there: Persmy is a web application built using the ASP.NET MVC system. It takes advantage of the speed and modularity of C# to create an app that features.
